com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations

Annotation Type FullText


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
 @Documented
public @interface FullText
    Enable full-text search for this field. In most cases you will want to do this.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      float boost
      Add a fixed index-time boost for this field.
      Language language
      Enable language-specific analysis of this field in the full-text index.

    • Element Detail

      • language

        public abstract Language language
        Enable language-specific analysis of this field in the full-text index. If set empty or null a generic (language-agnostic) analysis will be used.
        Returns:
        Language of the complex field. By default none.
        Default:
        com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.language.Language.None

      • boost

        public abstract float boost
        Add a fixed index-time boost for this field. Matches in boosted fields will be ranked higher in the result list.
        Returns:
        float number with the boost of the field. By default 1.
        Default:
        1.0f
